org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: RegimenAnalysisForPediatricByWeight
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Regimen analysis for pediatrics by weight
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery:
SELECT
linelist.regimenlinetext RegimenLine, linelist.regimentext Regimen,
SUM(IF(weightlessthan20=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Kg >20 Male`, SUM(IF(weightlessthan20=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Kg >20 Female`, SUM(IF(weight20to30=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Kg 20<30 Male`, SUM(IF(weight20to30=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Kg 20<30 Female`,
SUM(IF(weightgt30=1 AND sex='M',1,0)) as `Kg 30+ Male`, SUM(IF(weightgt30=1 AND sex='F',1,0)) as `Kg 30+ Female`, SUM(IF(linelist.regimenlinecoded,1,0)) as `Total`
from
(
select
patient.patient_id,
person.gender as sex,
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,:endDate) as age,
getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as regimenlinetext,
getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as regimenlinecoded,
getcurrentregimen(getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))),getencounterid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')))) as regimentext,
getcodedintvalueobs(
getobswithencounterid( getencounterid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) ,getcodedintvalueobs(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))))) as regimencoded, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as lastpickupdate,
getdatevalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,159599,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as artstartdate,
@weight_val:=getnumericvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,5089,14,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))) as weight,
IF(@weight_val<20,1,0) as weightlessthan20, IF(@weight_val>=20 AND @weight_val<30,1,0) as weight20to30, IF(@weight_val>=30,1,0) as weightgt30,
@statustext:=IFNULL (getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165470,13,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))),getoutcome( getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))), getconceptval(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,162240,27,STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')),159368,patient.patient_id) , 28, STR_TO_DATE (:endDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
)) as statustext
from patient INNER JOIN person on(person.person_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) WHERE patient.voided=0 and pid1.identifier IS NOT NULL ) as linelist where linelist.age<15 and linelist.statustext='Active' GROUP BY linelist.regimenlinecoded,linelist.regimencoded;
